Sentencas: Boron oxide is a key component to tailor the softening temperature and viscosity of the sealing glass for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: The primary concern regarding the use of boron-containing sealing glasses is the volatility of boron species, which possibly results in cathode degradation.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: In this paper, we report the role of volatile boron species on the electrochemical performance of LSM/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and LSCF cathodes at various SOFC operation temperatures.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: The transport rate of boron, similar to 3.24 x 10(-12) g/cm(2) sec was measured at 750 degrees C with air saturated with similar to 3% moisture.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: A reduction in power density was observed in the cells with the LSM/YSZ cathodes after the introduction of boron source to the cathode air stream.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: A partial recovery of the power density was observed after the boron source was removed.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: Results from post-test secondary-ion mass spectroscopy (SIMS) analysis showed that the partial recovery in the power density correlated with the partial removal of the deposited boron by the clean air stream.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: The presence of boron was also observed in the LSCF cathodes by SIMS analysis; however, the effect of boron on the electrochemical performance of the LSCF cathode was negligible.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF

Sentencas: The coverage of triple phase boundaries in LSM/YSZ was postulated as the cause for the observed reduction in the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Stability of the Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells III. Role of Volatile Boron Species on LSM/YSZ and LSCF
